name: Reach
size: L40 x D26 x H60 cm (with base).
description1: Reach 2021 is a work that continues the parallax sculpture, using the difference of different perspective mirror positions to present the beauty. It uses the basic structure of the human body to interpret the human body whose body language is visually deformed, so that the works show various angles, and the focus is to express the feeling of the subject. It reflects the extremes that the human body can reach in terms of movement and themes, allowing the elastic tension of the muscles and bones to reach the highest peak, expanding the upper arm extension and using the body to seek the center of gravity to achieve balance. the power of.
